name: Abyss dungeon
description:
"Greeting knight, welcome to the dungeon of Abyss. Ah, I see that you have element spells. Let see how depth can you reach"

_ The Game maker

--- Disclaimer---

This is my first small project that I used to study Unity. Thanks for playing a game. The game still in developing, I'm planning to publish in pc not just on web. Problems or feedbacks please consider commenting.

---Tutorial---

+ Left click to use card

+ Right click to discard card

+ Defeat enemy to reach the highest score

---Rule---

+ Each enemy will have different weakness and element, if you hit the weakness, you'll get one more turn, if you hit its element, you will take damage

+ You will die if your HP reach 0 point

+ There are two type of card, the attack card and heal card, use it wisely
